snippet: The effort to locate the wreckage of the plane and the pilots was aided at Turkey’s request by the American oceanographer who discovered the Titanic.
abstract: Rescue teams from Turkey locate the wreckage of an unarmed Turkish jet downed in the Mediterranean by Syrian gunners in June; the bodies of the two pilots are found inside.

byline.original: By SEBNEM ARSU and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: Sebnem Arsu reported from Istanbul, and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: The effort to locate the wreckage of the plane and the pilots was aided at Turkey’s request by the American oceanographer who discovered the Titanic.

headline.seo: Downed Turkish Plane and Dead Pilots Found
headline.main: Downed Turkish Plane and Dead Pilots Found With Aid of Titanic Explorer
headline.print_headline: Downed Turkish Plane and Dead Pilots Found With Aid of Titanic Explorer
